column3: News;Social media has shown the plight of an Australian man who claims to have been robbed of his money and passport.------Currently he is sleeping rough on the streets near  Preah Ket Mealea hospital with four dogs.Â According to the Facebook post he has no money or passport and cannot return to his own country.------He complained to the police but nothing happened. The public are asked to find him help from the Australian embassy
column4: as the man obviously has some serious issues.
